1.content:
Your plane had just landed in the City of Guliarna. After passing through customs you retrieve your luggage and head out in search of your hotel.
On your way to your hotel you managed to get lost. That is when you see some people down an alley way. You can either ask them for directions or continue on looking for your hotel without help.
1.title: Arrival

11.content:
Not wanting to waste any of your vacation time you go down the alley to ask the people there how to get to your hotel. As you aproach you overhear their conversation.

"I Don't think it's a good idea" says one of the men.
"Do not worry! It's perfectly harmless! All we need to do is find someone to trick into going along with it and soon the Kingdom will be ours!" replies the other one.
"I suppose so!" responds the first.
Getting a little freaked out by their conversation you start backing out of the alley. Unfortunately you trip and knock over a garbage can.
"Well well well, what have we here?" exclaims the first man. Suddenly he grins wildly and points at you. "Get him!" he orders.
You try to scamble away but are caught by the second man.
"You know boss I think he's just the person we've been looking for!" announces the second man.
"I think you are right!" replies the first as he raises a strange device and points it at you. Then he activates it and there is a flash of light.
When you come to your vision is partially obsrtucted by some translucent blue cloth. brushing it away you see a lovely young woman staring back at you. She was dressed in a sky blue satin dress with a matching blue veil on her head. Her face had a confused expression on it which troubled you as you thought that nobody that beautiful should ever be so confused. You reach out to comfort her when you realize that you are looking at a mirror. In fact you are the lovely lady dressed in blue!
11.title: The New Look

choices: Say you'll be down in a minute
111.content:
So shocked by the discovery you pass out. when you come to your vision is once again obstructed by the blue veil. You slowly stand up, trying to ignore the extra weight on your chest. as you brush the veil (and some long, smooth brown hair) out of your eyes you once again see the distressed young woman in the mirror. It seems that that part of it had not been a dream.
Suddenly there was a knock at the door. You started to panic. You'd just been turned into one of the most beautiful women you'd ever seen when, all you'd wanted was directions to your hotel. Turning around you see a huge bed covered with blue satin sheets and multicolored silk pillows.
"Excuse me princess!" came a voice from beyond the door, "Your Father is wondering when you'll be able to join us for breakfast."
Princess? Suddenly it hits you. You've been turned into the country's heir to the throne, Princess Juniper Hyasho. You were royalty now!
"Princess? Are you alright?" asks the voice.
"Yes!" you carefully say. You're shocked by how high your (or rather the princess') voice is. You then realize that you need to give the voice an answer.
111.title: Commoner turned princess

choices: No! That is invading the princess' privacy!
1111.content: Not knowing what else to do you announce that you'll be down in a minute. Now you have to figure out if what your wearing is appropriate to wear oustide of your (her) room. looking around you spot an open closet door. Walking inside and turning on the light you see hundreds of different articles of clothing. You then reach for one of the less revealing sets and take it back out into the bedroom. Now you remove the blue veil and start wriggling out of the dress. once that is done you wonder if it would be right to take a quick peek at your "new" body.
1111.title: Changing

11111.content: When you look at your new body you realize that you have much larger breasts than you thought. your skin is flawless and you decide that maybe you should get some clothes on.
11111.title: Look! It's your body now!

choices: Try to find out what happened to you.
111111.content: You struggle to get a simple sweatshirt over you chest. After 10 minutes you eventully stumble down the stairs........
111111.title: get dressed

choices: Tell them about the men in the alley.
Tell them your not the Princess.
1111111.content: You decide to play the part until, you figure out what happened to you. You sit down at the tables with a small "Greetings Father, Greetings Mother." And then, you remember of the men in the alley. If you tell them you probably have a good chance of getting your body back. What do you do?T
1111111.title: Go to the dining room.

choices: confront him and aks what and why he had done this
11111111.content: The moment you wanted to tell them about the men in the alley you have a closer look on the man, who now seems to be your father. You recognize him as one of the men, who seem to have kidnapped you and transformed you somehow into this princess…
11111111.title: Tell them about the men in the alley.

111111112.title: confront him and aks what and why he had done this

choices: Two months  (time for you to figure out how to escape)
1111111122.content:
Yes it was me but i only did it for the good of my people, you see we are a very small kingdom within a larger kingdom and they want to take us over.

Plus i only have one son but no daughters and this is where you come in, what do you mean? You going to marry the Prince who is next in line to the throne and bare him children then when the children are old enough they can make out kingdom the capital city of the incorporated kingdoms.

What the hell... Sophia the wedding is in...
1111111122.title: Admits it and explains why

choices: I think of a way to return to my body
11111112.content:
"I'm not the Princess, my King", I said feeling scared and kneel down.

Everyone in the room all looked in shock.

"What are you talking about my dear girl? Are you having a fever?" As the king touched my forehead and said, looking worried.

"No, really, Im not the princess, yesterday the men in the alley used a device and somehow switched my bodies with the princess" I said.

"My precious daughter, I guess you should take a rest upstairs." the king said, who seemed worried about my condition and told the servants to bring me upstairs.

Now..
11111112.title: Tell them your not the Princess.

choices: Go to the alley where they attacked you.
111111122.content: You try to convince everyone that you are not the princess, but noone seems to believe you. When night comes, you escape from the castle by telling the guards that you are going out for a walk. You decide that you need to find those men that transformed you into the woman you are now, but you have no idea where to start looking.
111111122.title: Escape at night.

1111111221.content: You think a good start would be the place where they captured you, so you search in the area of the airport and the alley where you encountered those cruel men first time!
1111111221.title: Go to the alley where they attacked you.

choices: you are stopped by the servant
111112.content: to hey with this! you arn't a woman and wont dress like one! unfortunately you have no other clothes so you decide to go out naked.
111112.title: walk down naked

1112.content:
Quickly you shout at them trying to make them leave. But it is not working like you thought, your too loud shouts have drawn some attention to other people, not only to these mysterious kidnappers, but to the initiator of the whole bullshit. You hear heavy footsteps approaching:
You try to see what is going on and who is approaching: You looked around frantically and noticed a man. He wore a black suit with a crest on the pocket. You looked at it carefully and recognized it. It was the seal to the royal family of Guliarna. You were about to say something when the man stopped you.
1112.title: Tell them to go away

11121.content:
"Hello son," he said in a heavy accent. "My name is Nauru, King of this country." You were shocked, what the king has done with and to you. "Recently my beloved daughter was assassinated. The event was quickly suppressed and no one knows about the situation."

"But what do you want with me?" you asked as your heart raced.

"Well you see my new wife is very sterile. I can no longer have offspring, and as such with the death of Juniper I have no heir to the thrown and thus ending my blood line. This is where you come in, I discussed it over with my finest men and we came to a decision." he told you pulling out a small emerald sphere.

"What's that?" you ask trembling.

"When excavating an old ruined castle we found this along with an old manuscript. According to the manuscript, this orb can transform anyone into someone else." he said and continued that you are the living proof that this was working as expected.
"We decided that it would be in best interest to use this to recreate my daughter."

"So why me?" you ask slightly curious as to this twist in your vacation.

"We randomly chose one young person from the airport, someone that wasn't a citizen of our country." he said.

"What about my family?" you ask.

"They will be let known that you were found dead on the side of the road. We will use this orb to make a dead person look like you." he said. This made you very nervous. You had two options, you could run or see how this unfolds.
11121.title: he speaks to you

choices: Accept your new life as Juniper princess of Guliarna and heir to the throne
Bide your time and wait for a more opportune time to escape
Don't risk waiting and getting trapped for good escape now.
111212.content:
"My boy, you should consider this a gift" Narau proclaimed looking directly into your eyes "Becoming my beloved daughter Juniper would be quite a considerable increase in comfort and the standard of your lifestyle, that goes without mentioning that due to the equality of succession laws and the fact you'd have no competition you shall inherit rule over this country when i do eventually pass from this world." That caught your attention, "In case you didn't know my country Guliarna has stood untouched by time and we still have a monarchy with complete control it's part of the appeal and our status of being 'The country untouched by time' brings in a lot of tourists... you'd inherit that for the price of starting over as my beloved daughter". By no means at all did you want to be somebody else let alone a woman which was so far removed from who you used to be, but inheriting a country was no joke. Guliarna wasn't a big country, about the size of your average US state but it was an incredibly wealthy one made rich through tourism and exports of rare goods that are seldom found anywhere else and known for their master craftsmen.

"of course you'd need to be properly educated in our nations history and culture as well as Juniper's history in particular so you could properly stand in for the late princess which will take some time" turning slightly so that he was partially facing the door "I know it is a significant change, one with which you'll need to come to terms with so i shall give you some time." Narau began walking towards the door stopping just before he passed the frame of the door "I don't think it needs saying but you don't actually have a choice in the matter, you know too much already and we can't chance changing you back to normal and spreading the news of what has happened here so it's either you accept your new life or die". With that sinister tone he left and the door was closed behind him and promptly locked.

There were windows all around you and you were only on the second floor of the castle you might be able to escape that way although the palace grounds were quite large and you had no idea where you were or where you should go, escape was possible though. The only immediate question left was was it worth it or should you simply accept your new life?.
111212.title: listen what else he said

choices: The king has already left, only the queen is at breakfast
1112121.content:
Flopping onto your rather sizable bed you began to come to terms with what the king said, you would have a good life here you'd be rich and looked after for the rest of your life hell you'd be the heir to the throne the last countries in the world that had an absolute monarchy. Surely you could find some benefits in living as Juniper, Pulling yourself off the bed you looked down at the blue dress you wore. It was a dress but it was of a better make than anything you'd ever worn, somewhat gracefully moving back to the mirror you'd experienced shock peering into before you got a better look at your face.

You were quite good looking now, the dress matched your blue eyes perfectly, in combination with your delicate facial features and luscious brunette hair that reached just above your shoulder-blades you were a beautiful woman. Your mind wondered for a minute as to what Juniper's mother must look like to create somebody this good looking especially given how relatively plain looking the king looked. Nothing seemed fake, not even the rather sizable breasts lightly sagging on your chest. After some more brief internal deliberation you sat at the end of your new bed and came to the conclusion that as far as you were concerned you were now Princess Juniper.

Getting up off the bed you walked over to the door and knocked lightly, it swiftly opened and you could see a maid on the other end. "Is something wrong princess?" she asked bowing her head deeply, composing yourself in as close as you could attempt to a regal manner you responded "Yes, i have decided i will be joining my father for breakfast". The maid looked up, "I assume after you've freshened up?". You were confused as to why you needed to freshen up but you weren't sure whether or not the maid knew about your situation so you decided to play along, "I suppose so" you said pretending to seem almost disinterested.

The maid waited for you to step back into the room and then walked her way over to the closet, peering inside you could see that it was almost half the size of your bedroom and it was completely full of all kinds of dresses, Jewelry, shoes and more. The maid returned with a bundle of clothes and gestured towards the mirror moving a small table and a chair to it. Sitting down the maid got to work 'freshening you up'. Putting on silk stockings and a pair of heels with a rather small heel, she also began to style your hair, turning it from long flowing locks into a bun held together by a jewel encrusted golden band.

Along with the styling and shoes was a rather skillfully applied layer of makeup, it was only light but it felt foreign and alien almost uncomfortable. Soon enough the maid stepped away and let you get up, looking in the mirror you once again were in awe of your beauty you looked regal before but now you looked the part. The maid waited patiently at the door for you to stop admiring yourself, once you were out the door which the maid closed behind you the maid led you through the exquisite palace. It was unlike anything you'd ever seen and you began to feel reassured that at the very least you'd be inheriting this amazing house.

"Through here princess" the maid said opening a double door.
1112121.title: Accept your new life as Juniper princess of Gul...

choices: Go and try to get your body back
112.content:
So surprised by the change you start to scream. it comes out in a high pitched, shrill voice. suddenly the door opens and a man holding a spear runs in.
"Are you alright princess?" he asks.
Princess? Suddenly it hits you. You've been turned into the country's heir to the throne, Princess Juniper Hyasho. You were royalty now!
"Um, I'm fine! I just, uh, saw a spider!" you shyly reply.
"I see! Nothing to worry about then!" states the man as he starts to leave the room. Just as he reaches the doorway he bows and then closes the door, backing out into the hallway.
"What now?" you wonder outloud.
You could ether go with the flow or try to find those men in the alley. Since they must of put you in this body they must be able to put you back in your own body!
112.title: To Run or not to run. That is the question!

1121.content: Deciding that you might as well not panic you calm down and take a seat on the bed. After all it can't be that bad to have been turned into royalty! Soon you get bored of just sitting on the bed. You decide that there are two things you can do. Either you stay in the bedroom and do some "personal" exploring or you go explore the palace.
1121.title: A choice to explore

11212.content: Going over to the door you get distracted by the bouncing of your new breasts. Trying to ignore it you open the door to reveal a long marble corridor. It extends in both directions as far as you can see. Do you go left or right?
11212.title: The Corridor

112121.content:
You continue down the left path. You are excited to see what is at the end of the corridor, but to your dismay it looks like there is nothing special at the end of the path. Suddenly, on the barren wall at the end of the corridor, a black door appears magically. Your feeling of depression quickly disappears as you run up to the door, hearing the clicking of your heels echo in the corridor. You twist the door knob, but it will not budge. Feeling sad again you wonder what to do now. Suddenly, writing in red says, "Only the heir to the throne can open this door." This confused you so much because the last time you checked, you were now the one and only heir to the throne. Princess Juniper did not have any siblings.

As you were about to turn around, with your cute new face pouting, a sterling silver necklace with a solid gold key attached to it appeared around your neck. Completely shocked by this occurrence, you almost forget about the door. Then it hit you, this is the key to the door! You face the door and are about to take off the necklace, when the key slowly rises from the end of the necklace and points toward the keyhole. A beam of energy shoots out of the end of the key and goes into the keyhole. Then you hear a soft click. As the door opens on its own, you look down the pathway to make sure the coast is clear and step inside with the door closing behind you.

Inside the door is a small room that looks like a secret study. In the corner is a bed. There is also a small collection of old books in a bookcase on the other side of the room, as well as a desk. There is a huge chandelier above lighting the entire room. "This is like straight out of Harry Potter or something..." was all you could mutter. This stuff was amazing but what you were really interested in was a gold ring with black trim, and a red ruby in the middle. The ring was rested on a stand in the middle of the room.
112121.title: The Door

choices: Use the ring to return to normal and leave your secret room for now
1121211.content:
You are feeling courageous and curious so you walk up to the ring and hold it in your hand. Suddenly, you hear a ghostly voice say, "Your kingdom is in danger, this will help you protect your home." You guess the voice is talking about those men in the alley way that got you in the Princess' body. There were planning on taking over the kingdom by weakening its monarchy. Your were not a fan of playing hero but you did want to get revenge, and hopefully your body back. Also, if they did attack, you would be defenseless in this body and might die. Something had to be done.

With your mind made up, you put on the ring. It feels so natural on your left ring finger. As you gazed at it, the ruby started to glow brightly. Then, a black cloud covered your entire body as you were lifted off the floor. You could hear fire all around you. You could feel it burning your entire body. But there was no fire that you could see. Everything was black. You screamed but could only hear the roar of the fire. You started to black out, but as quickly as it came, it all stopped.

You fell with a thud on the ground. You took a few seconds to gather yourself and stood up. Something felt different. You noticed that you were no longer wearing a dress. In fact, now you had on a black armor corset and tight, black, leather pants with a thin sheet of armor covering them. To your surprise the clothes were very flexible. You guessed it was some sort of magic fabric. "Well I guess this is better than a dress", you chuckled to yourself.

You wanted to get a better look at yourself, so you went over to a full body mirror. You could not believe what you saw. Your hair and eyes were dark purple, and your skin was now a burnt orange color. You looked like an insanely sexy demoness! "Woah...", was all you could say. You noticed that your voice was stronger, more powerful,and seductive.

"If I am a demon now then I should have some amazing powers", you think out loud just to hear your voice again.
1121211.title: Big Change

choices: Go find those guys and kick some ass!
Stay in the castle and try your other powers on a victim
11212111.content:
You think of powers a demon should have: shoot fire blast, shape-shift, flight, invisibility, mind control, and possession. You see a small bug on the wall and concentrate on hitting it with a fire blast. You notice a warm sensation in your hands a ball of fire sprouts in your open palm."Sweet." you say with a smirk. Then you aim and a blast of fire launches from your hand and incinerates the bug. "Yeah! Direct hit!" you cheer.

Next, you try the shape-shifting. You think of a picture of your former male body in your head and concentrate. You feel your chest disappear, your hair become shorter, and see your skin color become much lighter. You also feel your privates again.The transformation was complete! You think about just staying like this forever and return to your normal life when you suddenly feel the change reverse. You are a demoness again. The ghostly voice says," Shape-shifting is not permanent. Do not try to escape your destiny!"

You decide to accept your fate and wonder what to do now. With your powers you could definitely kick some ass and get your revenge on those guys from the alley. You also learn how to fly and become invisible while you searched for them. But you could also stay here and find someone to try your other powers on.
11212111.title: Sexy and Deadly

to the right you find yourself in a hudge chamber. here ther are two swords mounted on the wall. one seems to be made of solid gold. it has a ruby enbedded in the hilt.

the other is black all over, and has what lookes like a tiny skull embedded in the hilt.

It is then that you find out that you were on the ground floor of the building. you then run across the palace ground to a high stone wall.

A noise behind you causes you to turn round and you see a light go on in your room. Your abscence has been discovered. You can feel the panic growing within you. You decide to.

you set off into the forest. It's dark and cold here. every bit a fairy tale forest. you suddenly wish that you were at home playing an interactive story game online. that would hit the spot!

you hear a noise up ahead. a deep rumbling. you turn around but hear another noise behind you- a swishing sound. To continue seems treacherous. To go back seems foolhardy. you certainly can't stay here.

you turn and run, only to run headlong into a giant spiderweb! Above you you see a spider crawling down in the line, ready to eat you. "well well well what have we here?" It says. "A pretty little thing caught in my web. been a long time since I had anything so beautiful in my clutches. I do so like human women."

You try to struggle, but to no avail. the spider continues. "I suppose I could try and eat you...or I could keep you as a pet. I wonder which..."

wonder what to say, then the spider approaches you and says "I guess it depends. Could you remian here with me? be my beautiful little slave girl? see to my every whim? and I do mean every whim."

You wonder. this is life and death, but you still have your freedom, and you dont want to become this things pleasure toy. do you submit? and If you don't...will you survive?

1122211212.content: suddenly you hear hoof-beats. The castle guards! they've somehow found you! what do you do now? You could hide here, but do you trust this merchant to not turn you in? Is it worth putting both of you at risk? the hoof beats are coming closer. looking over at the merchant you wonder- can he be trusted? you see a back door to the shop. dare you risk running now? The horses have stopped. the riders have dismounted. it's now or never.

112221121211.content:
He helped you earlier with giving you the dress you are currently wearing and he also give you the hint about the witch, who might be able to help you, so you think you can trust him.
He looks out of the window of his little shop and sees also the guards coming nearer and nearer and he knows that they certainly will come inside his shop in only a couple of moments.
He gives you a key and said:”Go inside the back-room, this is my sons room, but he is not here currently. There are some clothes of him, maybe you can manage to hide yourself and disguise as a boy. Let’s hope that this will work…..

11222112121112121.content:
You need to get home and change back. You look through the room and find yourself looking for anything when the merchant comes in.
"Princess."
"I'm not a Princess," you say.
"What?" He asks, and then you quickly explain about the ray, about your world, and with that, he nods knowingly. "My grandmother traveled from a far off land and got stuck here, at least that was her tale.
"What was the name of this land?"
"Something like, New York or Jork, something like that."
"And what happened to her, did she ever go back?"
"No, she's buried in the cemetary next to my Grandfather." He smiles. "I think she fell in love and just never wanted to go back, still she told me tales of large parks, and pepsi and something called a coaster roller that was on the Island of Coney and fried french."
"Then, how come you know the witch will be able to return me?"
"Well, she offered to do so for my Grandmother, Only by then she had three children and an alehouse." He smiles. "The witch owed her a debt, you see."
"And you can get me to her?"
He nods. "But best we go by night, I know the way." He smiles, and for a second he blushes, offering his hand. "I'm Stephen by the way."
11222112121112121.title: try to find the witch

choices: No, I want to bargan for myself?
112221121211121211.content:
You stay in the back room that day and at last the store closes. He lends you a cloak ant together, the two of you sneak out a side gate where Stephen is good friends with the guard. You walk most of the night when Stephan leads you into a forest that you're sure you would be lost in even in daylight and at last to a large cottage in the woods.
With a floorish he knocks at the door.

"Hello," a woman, with dark black hair and not more than forty opens the door. Her eyes widen, "Stephan", how have you been.
"As well as can be expected since my wife and son died." He seems sad for a moment and you feel a tinge of sympathy.
She nods and looks at you. "Well, you must be the false princess, come to bargin no doubt."
You nodd, and she ushers you both in her cottage where you sit with the witch and Stephan around a warm fireplace.
"I was hoping I could use my grandmother's boon to pay for this, Stephan says rather sheepishly."
"You what?"
"Look, I know the witch is going to charge a great price, for what you want. But the witch owes, me or rather my grandmother.....and I think...this is how she would have liked to see the boon used."
"Stephan, why are you doing this," you ask.
He smiles in the firelight, and looks at you. He seems happy, though a little smug. The witch turns to you.
"And you wish to return home and to your proper sex," she says, her face not revealing a thing.
"Yes,"
"And do you wish to accept Stephan's offer to use his grandmother's boon on you?"
112221121211121211.title: You nodd, it's good he's willing to hel...

1122211212111212111.content:
"So be it, and may you be happy with your choice," She says, smiling.

You look at Stephan and suddenly you're feeling like you've known this guy all your life. He is safe, he is comfortable, he's home. All of a sudden your thinking of your life, your future, and you want to be with him, you want have his babies, and then you realise.....your thinking of Stephan, and its the kind of thoughts a girl has when she is passionately in love with someone.

And you are definately the proper sex to do something about it. In fact you don't, you can't think of yourself as male. Of course you realize what has been done to you. But bluntly....
"You bastard," you walk over to Stephan, smiling. "You tricked me," you say as you kiss him quite passionately.
"Do you mind?" He asks.
"I'm just going to have to punish you," you say wickedly as you bite his ear and he coos happily.
"Perhaps, you'd like to use the guest bedroom." The witch says, even though her suggestion barely registers, it's a good one. And you and Stephan retire. There, you do all the things you've been thinking of doing to Stephan.

The next morning you awake and find yourself helping her fix breakfast. In addition, your wearing the kirtle she loaned you when it hits you that the witch has adjusted other things in you. You know how to act like a woman borne and bred to this world without thinking it. Your former self, wouldn't being getting eggs from the kitchen or cooking or humming a folk toon which the witch picks up and you sing together.

"Are you happy, my dear," she asks.

"Quite," you say, and you mean it wholeheartedly.

"Good," she hands you a mirror and you look into it. You now have freckles and are blonde. Your brown eyes are now blue.
"What?"
"Consider it a wedding present," she says "now no one will think of you as the missing princess."
You nodd and give her a hug. She is being a good friend and in the years to come you think of her as your first friend in your new life.

That day you and Stephan return home and the next day, your bann are submitted to be wed. Even on the trip home, you and he talk, and you find you laugh at the same things, like many of the same things, and bluntly, you two are perfect for each other.
1122211212111212111.title: Yes

choices: It is a representitive of the Queen, who wishes to interview you.

11222112121112121112.content:
Being comfortable and very much in love, it is easy to make Stephan fall madly in love with you.
And in over ten years of marriage he is utterly faithful, as you are to him.
You find you do a wonderful job as a merchant's wife, acting as his factor and manager when he is away, organizing longer and larger merchant caravans and buying ships, and opening many trade routes. The two of you become happily wealthy.

Stephan and Juniper Strange. And to all around you, you are the happiest couple.
And over that ten years you have six children; Dudely, Gwendolyn, Margret, Hamlet, Denise and Alice. You are saddened when Dudely died in an accident when he is eight and Hamlet dies from some sort of infant fever. But you are happy with your girls, and though your husband would probably wish for another son, when you almost die delivering little Alice, he is content with your choice to have no more children, for he'd rather have you than anything in the world.

Oh yeah, Princess Juniper is found (obvious to you, a fake, not that you care) and in due time is crowned Queen.

And you have your own circle of friends. Merchants wives, neighbors, and especially the witch, whose name is Margery. She remains quite dear to you, being the author of your happiness.

Then, one day, someone knocks on the door, and your life changes.

choices: You wake up, concubine training is about to begin.
1122222212222211.content:
When you wake up, you are tied to the bed. So you cannot struggle.
"What's happening to me," you ask.
"We are readying you." You see a woman sitting next your bed. and she stands up.
"I thought I was to be his concubine."
"You are, but first you must be remade," the woman says calmly, "into a creature who lives to please, who is sensual in all her actions, and who takes pride in being such a creature. Who is accomplished, and feminine. Only then, will you be fit company for our master."
"But why am I being tied up?"
"We must administer the first potion, and our patients often struggle through the first phase."
"What do you mean?"
"We don't want treasures such as yourself injuring yourself", says the older woman. With that another hand grabs you, a large muscular man. He forces your mouth open and the old lady pours a potion down your throught. You find yourself stuggling, then thrashing as your muscles throb and tear, trying to escape the nightmare in your mind as your doubts, your nightmares, all your fears are spoken and you live them once more. They overwhelm you, and you cry and whisper. at some point you stop struggling and the woman who administered the potion is holding your limp body, brushing your hair.

"Oh dear girl" she says, sympathetically. "We don't want to leave you in that nightmare."

"You did this to me," you mumble, still consious but too weak.

"Doesn't matter, but from now on, until you finish your training, when you think of your past, you will only see the nightmares, we find it is a good motivator."

You shiver, anything would be better than going back. Damn right, it's a good movtivator. "What must I do."

"Tonight, only drink this," She hands you a potion. "It will relax you and prepare your mind for learning," you nod. You would do anything this woman says right now. So you drink the potion.

As she puts you to bed, you feel relaxed, your mind feels soft, like you are ready to absorb whatever you are going to be taught. In fact it feels good to be open, to be mallable, to be open to suggestion. You think someone is whispering this into you as you sleep, but you only smile.

Anything is better than the nightmares.
1122222212222211.title: your first day as a new concubine.

choices: Someone breaks into the training house
Nothing happens, and you enter the dream world again
11222222122222111.content:
When you awake you find you are eight or nine again. They ask you to get dressed, and without thinking you put on pants, a shirt, and your long hair is short again, like you were when you were a boy.
The old woman is there, as is another woman, and they inspect you. To you, your eight year old self, you can tell they are not pleased.
"Why do look like this" the woman who poisoned you, inspects you. "Do not lie." She is scary, and feeling like a small child you cannot help be intimidated.
"Speak up."
I---I was a boy.....until they transformed me," you tell your story, in fits and starts. After that she and the other woman converse and you strain to hear what they have to say. Maybe they'll free you, you wonder for a second.
The blonde woman, the second woman, instead comes forward. She is immaculately dressed and she smiles at you pleasantly, and leans down, and though she has a knife, you don't feel threatened when she cuts the boy's clothing from your body. "This is the first thing we must correct then," and she leads the now naked you to a mirror where you look and your obviously female preadolecent you the mirror.
"This is who you are," she says, her voice dripping like honey. "Every day you will look at it, you will accept it, and take care of it. Do you understand."
"Yes ma'mm," you say, and already your voice sounds girlish, so different than before. But you don't want to think of before as nightmares start to creep in. You concentrate on what she says.
"Good," and with that your first lesson, how to dress begins. The next day it is dancing, all day, as the the sweet blonde woman and and the darkly woman become your teachers. The training goes on for years as you learn to dance and excercise, as you learn to dress and carry yourself like and a proper lady. As time goes on your breasts budd and your menses comence, and you come to accept these. Every once in a while you are tested in subtle ways, to see how you identify yourself. Tests to see into your soul that catch you unaware, coming from "Beauty" as you come to think of the blonde woman and "Mother", all testing your self image. As the years go by, you think of yourself more and more as a girl, and a very feminine one that they are molding you into. As resistance dies, you begin to take pride in your accomplishments and pride in passing these tests.
Occasionally, rarely at first, you have encounters with young men and at first, then simply seem like boys. But some whispers in your mind from Beauty while you sleep, and you begin to dream of being a lover, being held in their arms, and doing other things. Oddly, the man who appears most in your dreams is very much like the man who asked you to be a concubine, and you blush whenever you think of him.
At last, when you are sixteen again you are tested, though you don't notice it and it is not mentioned to you. For you, Juniper, are literally unable to think of yourself as male, and when you encounter evidence of your former masculinity it literally means nothing to you. You remember before....though you don't like to think about it, but when you do, it's you, Juniper living that life....which seems utterly unimportant and alien.
You wake up in the middle of the night....and Beauty is sitting by your bed, stoking your hair. You find you are hungry, and thristy, but you feel warm and comforted to have her here.
"What happened, where am I."
"In the training house," she say calmly, "you've been here about a week."
"But I remember years," you say.
"It took years to overcome, an unusual complication that would have disrupted your training." She smiles knowingly, "But we only had a week, to make you ready, so you lived years in a week."
A servant brings you food, which you, begin to devour, but then stop yourself, remembering your manners and etiquitte. A girl such as yourself must always take care in such things. Beauty smiles a private smile as she notices your restraint.
"What's next."
"Once you are strong enough, we will have another session like this where you will learn various arts, music, painting, poetry, riding and then another period of rest and recovery, after which we'll have another session.
"What will I learn there."
"How to please a man," she says simply. You blush, you wish you could go strait to that lesson.
During the next few days, you find your in a room very much like the dream home you were in, and you find many of the gowns you were wearing hanging in the closet. In this time Beauty is your frequent companion and confidant, and you are very comfortable with this. You find yourself getting ready for the next day where you again will enter the dream world where you will become more like they (and now you) wish you would become and are happy about this. The night before---
11222222122222111.title: You wake up, concubine training is about to begin.

112222221222221111.title: Someone breaks into the training house

112222221222221111222.content: and then you find your facing---
112222221222221111222.title: someone else

choices: jump right to the slave market.
before you are sold you need to be prepared.
112222221222222.content: it hardly matters. its this or execution!
112222221222222.title: if he saves you he gets to sell you into slaver...

choices: will he sell you as a pleasure slave?
1122222212222222.content:
you are successfully smuggled out of the castile. the kingdom can boast an enormus slave market. there are tow type sof slave positions avalible. pleasure slaves and labor slaves. eaither way before you can be sold you have to dress up in something nicer then your servants rags.

pleasure slave
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_XUTxJfSFdbo/TL...

labor slave
https://encrypted-tbn1.gstatic.com/image...
1122222212222222.title: before you are sold you need to be prepared.

11222222122222221.content:
you are given an outfit meant to cover only the barest of necessities. before you put it on however you are bathed, given scented oils and a labor slave arrives to do your hair. when you emerge from the changing room your new captor (Stephen) looks up and smiles. "you'll fetch a good price no doubt". before you can respond he begins to chant. you open your mouth to say something, but find that your voice is gone! you want to run, but you suddenly find that you cant! Stephen chuckles. "that spell made you unable to speak or escape your master. no matter what you do from now on you'll always be a slave". you panic, but of course you cant protest or run.

to await the auction you are led into another room. this room is covered in pillows and blankets and filled with other slaves awaiting sale. none of them can speak either. exploring the room you notice one of the other slaves motioning for you to join her. you are reluctant since most everyone else here has been terrible to you. then out of the corner of your eye you spot a book. it looks very old.
11222222122222221.title: will he sell you as a pleasure slave?

choices: hands you a note. what could it say?
112222221222222211.content: she leans in close and...
112222221222222211.title: see what the girl wants.

choices: 'spells and charms' this could be interesting...
'virtual reality: imprison your foes in a digital fantasy world' WAIT WHAT!?
112222221222222212.content: the cover of the book says:
112222221222222212.title: examine the book!

choices: you aren't sure if the book is for real or not. better hold on to it.
the book is defiantly for real!
1122222212222222122.content: amazed at what you see you open the book. it describes step by step how to set up a virtual reality fantasy world. the victim would be seated comfortably, and never be aware that they've never left. you begin to breathe faster as you wonder "could this be what happened to me?" you also wonder why your captors would leave this book just lying around.
1122222212222222122.title: 'virtual reality: imprison your foes in a d...

choices: do it! maybe there's something in there you can use!
it wants blood! it's obviously evil!
11222222122222222.content:
you are given a new uniform. oddly enough, house slaves in the kingdom tend to wear something resembling french maid dresses. reluctantly you put it on. http://media.thehubsa.co.za/forum/upload...

after you are prepared your new master places a spell on you to prevent you from leaving his house. he then head out to find a buyer. as you wait, you begin to grow board. you begin to explore the house.

the man has a huge manor. it would take you all week to see every square inch.as you explore you find an old key in the master bedroom. heading upstairs you find a dusty old chest. There is an inscription that reads: "I open by blood"

to open the box you will have to give it blood! is it worth it?
11222222122222222.title: or as a labor slave?

choices: let the gaurdsmen have her for thier own entertainment!
112222222.content: unfortunately no servant approaches the king directly. as soon as he sees you the king orders his guards to seize you! you are easily brought down. the king must now decide what to do with you...
112222222.title: you are sick of this, and decide to confront th...

12.content:
Deciding against asking for directions you continue on walking. after hours of searching you finally find your hotel and check in. after that you go on to enjoy your two week vacation at the end of which you return home.


The End
12.title: An uneventful vacation

info.brief_description: On vacation you are attacked by some thugs. when you wake up you're a princess.
info.description:
You are on vacation in a far away country. Suddenly you are attacked by some people and you pass out. When you wake up you find that you have become the heir to that country's throne, the Beautiful Princess Juniper who has brown eyes and long, flowing brown hair.

do not kill the main character

no sex

try to use good grammar

Keep personalities, names, physical descriptions constant

Please add!
